titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3436) to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to make technical corrections.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-665.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 169 - 243 (Record Vote No: 176).

bill.summary: 6/2/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3436 (Older Americans Act of 1965 technical amendments). Lays on the table H. Res. 314, providing for the consideration of such bill.
